title: Jordyn Woods says she's single before jokingly teasing she's pregnant... nine months after scandal
text:
She was caught up in a cheating scandal earlier in the year with Tristan Thompson - the boyfriend of Khloe Kardashian who is the sister of her former BFF, Kylie Jenner.

And nearly nine months on, Jordyn Woods confirmed she was currently single, before teasing that she was expecting.

The 22-year-old took to her YouTube channel for a Q&A session with her younger sister Jodie, 14.

Scroll down for video

She's expecting! Jordyn Woods confirmed that she was single and teased she was expecting during a sit-down Q&A video on YouTube on Monday

'Guys, I have an announcement,' she teased before adding, 'I'm expecting....abs.'

'I am single and expecting some abs soon if I keep working for them.'

She went on to describe who her ideal man would be if she were to find love.

Single and expecting abs: 'I am single and expecting some abs soon if I keep working for them'

Romance: She was previously linked to Kardashian-Jenner friend, Fai Khadra, who she dated for a year (pictured in NYC in 2017)

'The ideal guy for me is someone...it sounds cliche but someone who's driven, someone who's passionate, someone that wants to be the best at what they do, someone that is intelligent.'

Jordyn added that intellect was definitely important and high on her criteria list.

'I cannot stand not being able to have a conversation with someone, and that's the case with a lot of these guys out here. They do not know how to hold a conversation.'

She continued: 'I'm not trying to waste my time. A great sense of humor and style would be nice too. The list could go on and on but I'm not picky.'

Celebration: Jordyn has already amassed 370K views on the video and has 123K YouTube subscribers after launching her channel last week. She celebrated the feat on Monday by heading to the YouTube headquarters

Split: But the beauty's private life was really thrown into the spotlight back in February after she was caught kissing Tristan Thompson, who at the time was still with his baby mama, Khloe Kardashian (pictured 2018)

Jordyn has already amassed 370K views on the video and has 123K YouTube subscribers after launching her channel last week.

She celebrated the feat on Monday by heading to the YouTube headquarters.

Jordyn has continued to keep her relationships private and out of the spotlight.

She was previously linked to Kardashian-Jenner friend, Fai Khadra, who she dated for a year.

But the beauty's private life was really thrown into the spotlight back in February after she was caught kissing Tristan Thompson, who at the time was still with his baby mama, Khloe Kardashian.

Shortly after the incident came to light, she was forced to leave her BFF Kylie Jenner's home where she was living.
description: Jordyn Woods confirmed that she was single and teased she was expecting during a sit-down Q&A video on YouTube on Monday.
